title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Join the fight @RealRLimbaugh on Twitter. Where's evidence of Biden's pending victory? Leave it all on the field this election, because it's our last chance to save America as founded. Judge Barrett could face a Kavenaughing. Is feminist hotel's tampon mural of RBG the way to honor her? WHO says lockdowns are bad -- WHAT? Obamacare was designed to fail, and Biden will finish the job by taking away your employee-based coverage.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Follow that new Twitter account: @RealRLimbaugh. Poll shows most people think their neighbors are for Trump. Doesn't this feel a lot like 2016 with the polls all showing the Democrat winning in a landslide? Kevin McCullough's insights into 2020. Schumer says Democrats won't vote for quorum on Barrett. Solid majority says they're better off than they were four years ago. What's behind WHO flipping to opposing lockdowns to fight COVID? Callers don't share Rush's optimism.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The New York Times suddenly discovers talk radio (again), and its power to persuade -- after yet again playing down the audience size. Liberals turn to podcasting because they cannot succeed in radio. Judge Barrett's statement makes clear she understands the role of a justice isn't to write new law or be an activist, just as her mentor Justice Scalia taught. Caller sounds the alarm about mail-in voting fraud. What's behind WHO's flip-flop on lockdowns?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
